Title: CRM 2011 ERD Designer
Description: The CRM 2011 ERD Designer is a Silverlight 4 application that is packaged as a Managed CRM 2011 Solution. This tool allows you to build ERD (Entity relationship diagrams) that are dynamically updated based on the published CRM entities and Fields; you can create/edit/remove entities and fields from the ERD designer. The tool allows also printing the diagrams.
HomeWiki:
CRM 2011 ERD designer
 

Project Description

The CRM 2011 ERD Designer is a Silverlight 4 application that is packaged as a Managed CRM 2011 Solution. This tool allows you to build ERD (Entity relationship diagrams) that are dynamically updated based on the published CRM entities and Fields; you can create/edit/remove entities and fields from the ERD designer. The tool allows also printing the diagrams.

 

New version 1.0.0.1 now available with more features!
Thanks everybody for the great feedback! 

 



Note This release is currently in Beta so please provide feedback in the discussion area for any areas of improvement.
